content.detailedDescription:
It was a perfect blue sky/no cloud day.We were parked in a busy parking lot between the mass pike and barnes airport having lunch at 1pm. my son pointed out a "funny bird".  near & above, but not interacting with 2 large crows, was what appeared to be a good sized hubcap (it was probably about the same size as the wingspan of a large crow) falling from the sky.  it looked like a hubcap in that it's color was gray/slivery and gray/tan - like a dirty wheel cover might be.  it had rectangular holes going around the edge in the same way wheel cover would.  i assumed it might've been a part falling off of a plane since we were very near an airport. there were no planes that i could hear or see at the time.  it appeared to fall in a manner consistent with something flat and circular in shape.  (imagine a paper plate with something very light on it say, a blob of ketchup) i looked around imagining that it might fall onto a car or a pedestrian. i pulled out my camera to see if i could zoom it to get a better look at the thing and where i thought it would land. my card was full so i couldn't figure out how to use that feature quickly.   i turned back around from throwing the camera on the front seat of the car, looked to see how close it was to the ground and it had begun "falling" up.  it was moving in the same manner but upwards,slightly faster than it had been "falling" and moving away from my position. as it rose higher and almost out of my sight, ( 20 seconds ish )the sun glinted off of it and i realized that it must've had some part of it that was shiny metal although it did not appear to have  been shiny up until that point. 
i did not feel particularly scared, upset or what have you. i was just pretty curious. i can't get the image out of my mind though because it was just plain wierd.
 i can't imagine this was under intelligent control because of it's flappy type of movement but it wasn't windy enough for an object of any weight to be held aloft and propelled upward in that way. 
the whole thing took about one to one and a half minutes and the total movement of the object might be described as a straight downward fall then up and away at an apx. 70 degree angle.
content.summary: " hubcap" appeared to fall out of the sky then "fell" up and away.

content.detailedDescription:
Started off seeing a bright orb that looked similar to venus except it moved closer, then overhead, and finally past me.  then i started noticing other blue and red lights that appear as glowing orbs on a 12x optical digital camera. i started filming and snapping pictures then comparing them to the other ones and noticed that there were hundreds of ufos that are imitating stars and the constellations behind them.  i've seen several low flying silent objects that pulse bright lights.  on still shots i can make out several color changing bulbs along a boomerang shaped object.  

i've read that people have seen them sucking up large amounts of water over bodies of water which would make this next part make sense.  i've seen what appears to be the front fly downward while the outer edges stay still so in essence it appears to spin on it's own axis making it blur and my guess is it's rotating at high speeds to separate substances of different densities by centrifugal force.  thus seperating the two atoms of hydrogen from oxygen and creating hydrogen fuel cells for their power, so in essence we're the bp of our solar system.  

these sightings have occurred from october 1st 2007-present.  i have several videos but the most convincing ones couldn't be caught on tape due to their habit of traveling fast as light, kind of makes it hard to prove a skeptic wrong when all you have is a blurred image.  best proof is to watch the night sky for abnormalities such as constellations n stars flashing blue and red with some of them breaking formation then flying back to where it should be.  they all appear brighter to me than surrounding stars and move counter-clockwise repeating the night sky.  the thing that makes them stand out the most is the ones on the horizens appear lower than the rest and i've seen the most activity when most people are asleep from 3:30-6:00am. all of the brighter "stars" seem to move in unison so that's one hell of a tactic to invade a planet.  it appears they send a few low flying scout ships to record how our night sky might appear to us and then the rest cover the stars up glowing bright to cover up the star behind them.  then they just hover and observe.

my friends thought i was going crazy until they saw some of the things i saw and now they're convincing their friends.  i took footage to my local news station and they blew me off of course saying it was venus but venus doesn't move like the things i saw.  the red and blue lights that have a bright flashing strobe lights are our planes flying around the ufos i've seen disappear and made no sound.  

i was out filming friday oct. 5th and saw several low flying ufo's while at my friends house.  we went back inside after our cigarette break to finish watching our movie when the pandora air siren went off.  that sound freaked me out because i though we were under attack or something but it was a fire alarm down the road according to her dad's police scanner.  i drove out to the country down the street to check it out and saw the barn fire.  i deleted some footage of the other encounters to snap a short video of the fire but the crazy part is i saw a flying triangle on the backside of the fire but not a bright glowing orb surrounding it.  i'm not sure if the three objects around the tree on the left are debris flying from the fire or the under side of the craft i saw in the area afterwards. i didn't see it do anything to the barn itself and there's also 2 brighter objects that could either be debris or another craft above the fire. i just kick myself for not getting the 2gb memory stick while i saw at the store earlier.  i only had the 32mb internal one so i kept having to edit the size down to cut out the getting focused in on it. when you only have 41 sec of footage total you try to make it last.  

i was a nonbeliever before last week, i always just hoped there would be intelligent life out there that would come to make contact someday. 

willis s., a.K.A chicken little....The sky is falling!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.shape: Boomerang,  Diamond,  Flash,  Oval,  Sphere,  Star-like,  Triangle
content.summary: 100+ ufos eastern sky imitating stars and constellations for past several nights

content.detailedDescription:
I was out on the porch of a friends apartment visiting john carroll university around cleveland, ohio.  while sitting on the porch of a 10-story building we saw a great big green light that is ircular shaped.  we stared and told everyone on the porch.  we all looked at the green circle until it swooped down very fast towards the ground leaving a trail of light, that wasn't a fading trail, but a distinct trail, that gave you the effect of a slideshow of pictures.  we were all very impressed and haven't stopped talking about our experience since.
_j.R. chicago, illinois
content.summary: Bright green lights with trails moving downward

content.detailedDescription: I have been taking random pictures.  here is another one.
content.summary: Two objects close together

content.detailedDescription:
I was on the roof again.  i bought my new camera with super night shot plus.  i had the camera on standby and when it the camera got to about 60 minutes or so on the battery i said to myself (after waiting for about 30 min.)  there's no point in keeping it on until its time.  it couldn't have been more than 30 seconds later and south of my position crossing from west to east one showed up... i said outloud "bingo" and looked down to get the camera up and running, by the time i got it set and looked back up to get its position. it cloaked.  
     about 15 minutes passed by and i was lying down on the roof because after a while my neck hurts from looking up. so after getting comfortable i was looking straight up and one passed over again.  the clouds covered it up before i could do anything. so another frustrating night for me.

     it seems that they are very aware of my thoughts but it seems they want me to see them, and obviously learn something.  i do feel that they are being discreet for a reason.  i can only hope that in time the truth will be known.
content.summary: 2 passover's

content.detailedDescription:
I took several random pictures of these are the result.  i don't know what they are.  could be birds i suppose, but the boomerang looking thing looks too much in focus with the hills to be a bird.

most of these need to be enlarged much bigger, for instance what i call the 'tictactoe' shot.  you'll see why.

what do you think?

peace,
jim
content.summary: 3 pics of various shapes

content.detailedDescription:
This is a short clip of a 'white object' hard to define.  stop the clip at 9 seconds, then gradually inch up.  make sure the screen is the biggest picture it can be.  then also stop at 13 seconds, and then at 51.

what is that?
content.summary: Short clip which shows eagle, but also stop at 10, 13, and 51 seconds.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving south on the hutchinson river parkway between mount vernon,new york & the village of pelham, new york. traffic was heavy and moving slow. just before going under an overpass i looked up and saw the sphere spinning. it was very high up because an airplain passed under it going south heading to a new york airport. i passed under the overpass and looked up again. the object was spinning and just shot straight up and was gone out of sight. the plain was still heading south at that time as well.I did not see this object again.I got off the parkway at the city island exit.That was the first time i ever saw anything like that.....
content.summary: High flying sphere over westchester county parkway,new york.

content.detailedDescription:
Around the winter of 1980, january perhaps, i just got off work at 9:30 p.M. from the auto dealership. i was a car salesman at the time. i started driving towards the city of toronto, canada, on the qew (queen elizabeth way) eastbound to meet some friends at a bar on the esplanad (a street lined with nightclubs). i didn't have anything to drink and didn't smoke any pot on that day/evening. 

as i was driving, i noticed a string of lights slowly rotating counter clockwise over the city of toronto, at about the ten o'clock position from my point of view. this caught my eye because these formation of lights were very unusual. the lights were evidently in a circular pattern with about two thirds visible as the other third rotated out of view. imagine a pie plate with about 25 lights around the circumference of it. as this "pie plate" would revolve, a third of these lights would be hidden from view as if they were obstructed by a solid body. it was at night so all i could see was these rotating string of lights but they were definitely on a "fixed" platform as the lights were revolving in unison. 

although i've heard of ufo's and was curious, at that time in my life, i didn't really give that much thought about them. i've always been interested in nature and especially about the universe. i've seen all kinds of aircraft and advertising blimps at night before. i drove taxi's off and on for fifteen years on the night shift and have seen countless meteors, lightening, satellites etc. on two occasions i've even seen extremely bright, slow falling, green fireball meteors lighting up the ground, for a couple of seconds, as if it was daylight . i've read, in later years, were other witnesses reported green fireballs as ufo's. i chuckled to myself thinking how easily "ufo believers" can be fooled by natural phenomenon. 

anyway, these circle of lights were slowly descending and approaching towards me (westbound), while i was driving about 115 kilometres per hour on the highway eastbound. these lights were getting closer and closer as "we" approached each other. i recall thinking to myself that this must be some kind of advertising balloon and those lights were letters. as i kept driving, i was paying more and more attention to this object because the closer it was getting, the more unusual it looked. i kept glancing at it, while driving, waiting until it was close enough to read what these letters were saying, still thinking it was some kind of advertising blimp. the closer it got, the more i looked at it. now at my nine o'clock position, the string of rotating lights started to bank left like an airplane would "turning right" at this point, i realised that these lights were not letters at all. they were different shaped, yellowish white lights. the reason these lights were different in shape was because they were "ingrained" into some body. when the lights were seen head on, they were circular. but as they rotated out of "direct" view, they changed shape like the different crescents of the moon. that's why they appeared to be all different shapes. 

anyway, during the time when this object started to bank left, from my point of view, i was struggling with myself trying to understand whether this was a plane or a balloon. it was flying too slow for a plane, yet, too fast for a blimp. also, it didn't appear to be flying or floating. the best way i can describe it's motion is that it looked like it was "sailing" in the sky. 

what's interesting here is that the human brain tries to associate what the eyes are seeing, to something already seen or experienced before. that's why i was at war with myself trying to decide whether this object was a plane, blimp or a balloon. every time i resigned myself to what i must be witnessing, i jumped to another conclusion. this jumping from one conclusion to another occurred during the whole experience. i was imagining all kinds of things. for example, if it was a plane, the only way these lights could have been positioned was in a circle because this plane must have had some kind of supporting structure in a circle from wing tip to wing tip. this didn't make any sense at all. i've seen advertising planes before. this was nothing like this. not even close. than i was trying to imagine a "goodyear blimp" with these letters going across it's side. this was nothing like it either. so here i was, trying to drive and watch this object at the same time. as i was driving, i started to slow down because i kept looking at this circle of lights more than the road ahead of me. in retrospect, i don't even know how i kept my car on the road because i was so awed by this display in the sky. 

here is the killer. 

as the object kept banking and banking more and more, it eventually ended up totally perpendicular to the ground! the first thing that came to mind was a big ferris wheel rotating in the sky. at this point i slowed down to about 50 kph (30 miles an hour in a 60 mph highway for my american friends) and put my four way, flashing hazard lights on my car fearing that another car would smash into the back of me for going so slow on a 100 kph highway. 

here is the shocker. 

as i was mesmerised by this ufo, a surge of adrenaline hit me like a ton of bricks. i didn't realize how big this thing was. at first i thought it was the size of an airplane fairly close. it was gigantic! at least twice the size of a football field, bigger than an aircraft carrier!!! i don't know what gave away it's size. maybe the reflections of light on the ground. the best way i can relate this sudden realization is like one of those illusions most of us have seen. you know, when you look at a pixel drawing with an image you can't see until you stare at it for a while? after a period of time, you make out the face of a women or something like that? that's kind of the transformation i experienced. at first i thought the object was the size of a large plane than suddenly i really saw it. it was huge!!! i yelled out loud to my self, "holey f**k, it's huge!!!". i don't f***ing believe it, it's f***ing huge!!!. i thought it was fairly close at first, than bang!, it was much farther away and larger than my brain first comprehended it. speaking about this surge of adrenaline. have you ever had a really close call having a car accident? when your heart rate skyrockets to about 180 beats per minute? that's what i felt when i realised how gargantuan this object was! i could literally feel my heart pounding like crazy. to be frank, it literally scared the hell out of me, when i realized how big it was. at this point, i rolled down my window and pointed to this giant "ferris wheel" in the sky to the other motorists, but it appeared no one seemed to notice as they screamed by me at regular highway speeds. i remember how cold it was when i rolled down my window. it was something like minus 30 celsius below zero. 

after, i don't know how long, probably only a few seconds of rotating in this perpendicular position, this thing started to climb and right itself and "sail" back to the direction it originally came from. i rolled up my window, turned off my hazard lights, and started to speed up to chase it. still it seemed other motorists didn't notice this object. it still irks me to this day. as i was approaching the city limits, this object was in it's flat position again climbing over the city. then, all of a sudden, the rotating lights turned off except for a red "aircraft like" blinking light (which i never noticed before). after a few seconds, the rotating lights turned on again. it was like in the movie "close encounters of the third kind". the lights just blasted on. than after a few seconds they turned off again as it seemed to be right over the city. strange behaviour. now i was exiting off of the highway on to spadina rd. i lost track of these lights because of the tall buildings. when i was on the street where i was going, i saw a cop parked on the other side of the road writing a parking ticked. i stopped in the middle of the road and ran over to him. he was quite taken aback by my seemingly aggressive approach. i asked him, "how long have you been here?" i forgot what he said, but i asked, "did you see that big circle of lights flying in the sky? he said "no". after parking my car, i met my friends at the bar, "baily's", and told them what happened but they didn't take me seriously as they've already had a few and were more interested in the ladies. 

after "sitting at the bar by myself" for a couple of hours i went home. i was living at my parent's house at the time, temporarily, so when i got home around 1 a.M., i called the police. i didn't know who else to phone at the time. they didn't take me seriously of course so after that, i phoned the toronto international airport and managed to get through to air traffic control and asked them if they had anyone call in with a ufo report. nothing. so i called the police again and convinced them to take me seriously as i wanted to make a report. they told me they can send a couple of officers to my house. as it was late and my parents were asleep, i told them i'd rather come to the station the next day to report. next morning, when i contemplated going in i decided not to, fearing they would think i'm some kind of wacko. 

as the days went by, scanning the newspapers looking for a "ufo sighting" to no avail, i started doubting myself. i was trying to convince myself that perhaps i was somehow mistaken. maybe it was something not out of the ordinary at all. maybe it was a balloon or airplane of some kind. maybe like thousands of others, i witnessed something that i misinterpreted for something else. 

and now the conclusion. 

about a week or so later, on or about the tenth page of the toronto star, bottom right hand corner, there it was! a short article. "dozens of mississauga residents reported a ufo as big as a football field!!!" i don't recall the whole article. i'll never doubt myself again no matter how much ridicule i'll be subjected to. after about 27 years, i just had to let this out.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: An unidentified, circular object, surrounded by numerous lights, twice the size of a football field.

content.detailedDescription:
I had several sightings last month.  i made an extensive report, which is still under investigation.  this happened in the same place i am now.

someone suggested i take random pictures and see what happens.

this is what happened.  you can see the pictures.  i don't know what these things are, and i can post only 3 at a time.  maybe someone with really good picture analysis ability can figure it out.

peace to us all.
content.summary: Several stills and movie clips of anamolous objects

content.detailedDescription: I was locking up my garage at night. it was dark out and i was fumbling with the key in the lock. i heard a strange sound, rather like a hum? that instinctively made me look up to find the source of the noise. it sounded like it was coming towards the front of the house at the top of the tree line.  suddenly, a bright flash went off to the right hand side like a camera flash. within this flash was a sphere shape that was completely filled with clearly defined stripes of color (vertical). it made me think of a prism, or like the t.V when there is a test for the emergency broadcasting system. i think there was a low level hum. the colors were reflected onto the clouds that partially surrounded it. this "image" lasted only about 3 or four seconds at most. the colors seemed to sizzle? then it just dissappeared with great intensity. like thhhhhhwp!  also, it momentarily lit up my back yard with light like bright moon light. there were commercial aircraft in the sky. then i finally locked the door to the garage, but it seemed even darker after all that lighting. if i held out my hand  at arms length,a quarter would have covered it (the object) up and a tennis ball would have covered up the glow it emmitted. it was far enough away and up in the sky that i wasn't afraid, but i can't explain this. i appreciate objectivity, and can honestly say i hadn't thought too much on the topic of ufo's. what can this be? thank you.
content.summary: Sphere shaped  object that had a prism like effect--very colorful like a rainbow

content.detailedDescription: I was locking up my garage at night. it was dark out and i was fumbling with the key in the lock. i heard a strange sound, rather like a hum? that instinctively made me look up to find the source of the noise. it sounded like it was coming towards the front of the house at the top of the tree line.  suddenly, a bright flash went off to the right hand side like a camera flash. within this flash was a sphere shape that was completely filled with clearly defined stripes of color (vertical). it made me think of a prism, or like the t.V when there is a test for the emergency broadcasting system. i think there was a low level hum. the colors were reflected onto the clouds that partially surrounded it. this "image" lasted only about 3 or four seconds at most. the colors seemed to sizzle? then it just dissappeared with great intensity. like thhhhhhwp!  also, it momentarily lit up my back yard with light like bright moon light. there were commercial aircraft in the sky. then i finally locked the door to the garage, but it seemed even darker after all that lighting. if i held out my hand  at arms length,a quarter would have covered it (the object) up and a tennis ball would have covered up the glow it emmitted. it was far enough away and up in the sky that i wasn't afraid, but i can't explain this. i appreciate objectivity, and can honestly say i hadn't thought too much on the topic of ufo's. what can this be? thank you.
content.summary: Sphere shaped  object that had a prism like effect--very colorful like a rainbow

content.detailedDescription:
During an outdoor concert where i was a stagehand working with creedence clearwater revival and curtis salgado, we witnessed 3 bright objects i first thought were planets although the positions weren't right for that. two objects began circling the third and suddenly either an f-15 or f-14 did a fly-by near the objects and one of them shot off to the north at incredible speed. being an ex-airforce weatherman i knew these were not rawindsone devices but indeed controlled aircraft.
after a few minutes of observing from the concert stage i pointed out the objects to other musicians and the sheriff's deputies acting as security.
we then saw 4 more spheres moving slowly and randomly to the southwest of our location when a very large object i can only describe as comb-shaped came in and out of view for only about 10 seconds. at this point most of hte objects faded from view except for two which actually came close enough to make out as silver spheres and they stayed in one place for the next 20-30 minutes until it was dark and we could no longer make out if they were present. one odd thing or rather another odd thing about this incident is that several days before on sept 6th 1998 we actually saw a glowing object crash near roseburg oregon and though i tried to report it to police they ignored me and to this day i truly don't think anyone ever investigated the crash site. it was probably a meteor but i don't know.
i am currently as far as i know the only witness who knows where the site is that the object came down and exploded in a series of three large, bright green flashes of light.
content.summary: 6-spherical objects 1-chevron shaped object

content.detailedDescription:
It was early in the evening around 7:40pm local time, and about and hour after sunset. i���m an amateur astronomer and i was in my yard setting up my telescope for an evening of ccd imaging. as my telescope was going through the alignment procedures, i began to look to the sky and watch for satellites passing by.  the early evening is usually a good time for that. 

o���hare airport is directly to the southwest of my position about 2-3 miles. i noticed an aircraft climbing out and heading directly from the airport flying toward the northeast. living close to the city, city lights reflect off the ���belly��� of aircraft and give them an interesting glow.  i was just watching the plane fly by and i followed it as it passed and headed off to the northeast. at that time i saw something coming from the exact direction that initially i thought was another plane coming from the northeast, but at a much lower altitude and heading directly toward the airport to the southwest. i immediately thought this was odd and i began trying to identify it for several reasons. 1. absolutely no lights 2. no aircraft flying to the airport would arrive inbound directly under the same path of the aircraft i just saw departing. 3. ���if��� it was an inbound plane, it was not on a ���normal��� final approach course to the airport. 4. it was completely silent. 5. the size and shape was odd.

as the object came over the top of me, i noticed the reflection of the ground lights off the bottom of it.  it appeared to be of a metallic structure.  i kept trying to identify it.  it appeared to have a winged or boomerang shape to it. i���d guess the altitude to be 300������500��� above ground level.  it was moving on a straight and steady course at an estimated speed of 150 mph ��� 200 mph.  it moved by fairly quickly, so i didn���t have a lot of time to study it.  i���d also estimate the size to be about the size of a 737 or possibly smaller commuter regional jet type. i questioned myself that it might be a bird and i may have misjudged the size, altitude, and speed. but if it was a bird, it was well above my 75��� tree and would have been the largest bird i���ve ever seen even if i misjudged it.  even the largest bird i���ve seen in my area, a turkey vulture with a 6��� wing span, wouldn���t even be close to the size even if i misjudged the altitude. also, it had a metallic reflective nature to it. i also thought��� well��� may be it was some type of balloon or a group of balloons tied together.  nope, the winds that night were from the southwest and it would be been flying directly in headwind. again, the silence of it was very strange for the size and speed of movement. it just continued in the same direction to the airport with no change in speed or direction and i lost sight as it went behind the tree line. i was curious if anyone else had seen anything strange that night.  i did notice that about 4-5 minutes after it past, some aircraft were flying in a ���non-standard��� pattern as though they had a missed approach.  i was curious if the airport had any ���strange��� disruptions that evening around 7:50pm???

i was a commercial pilot for a long time, an avid amateur astronomer, my bs degree is in aerospace science, but this was one of the strangest things i���ve seen.
content.summary: Object flew overhead, silent and no lights.

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i put our two children to bed and sat out side for a while till we decided to go to bed, which was about 9:30pm. at 12 midnight, i heard something so i sat up in bed and looked at the bedroom door, which was open, you could see our hallway and back door from our bedview, at the start of the bedroom door and to about half way down the hallway there was a bluish white light, the ligt was lighting up the hall way area, and in the light you could see a lot of particals floating around like as if someone threw white powder in the light beam! i looked at the clock it was 12 midnight exactly, i looked at our baby in the crib she was facing me, looked back at the hallway i saw a small fat brown blobby thing, with some what of a childs face! but just blobby, it looked really weird, then a head of something grey popped threw the hallwall wall, then it slowly stepped into the hallway from out side and they just stood there looking at me, lol, i stood up and just stood there just to see a taller bluish-gray looking thing step threw our wall into the hallway, this thing was huge and thin!, and it was acting dainty like, it put its hand out towards me and for some reason i walked to it!, i wasnt scared at all! and i turned around and the two smaller ones were infront of me, the gray little one looked at me and when i looked in my room and the baby was still facing where i would be sleeping and my husband was still sleeping in the babies same direction as well and my side of the bed was empty!, i looked at the clock, it was not 12:01am exactly, i was still holding the large beings hand "finger tip/thumb holding", we stepped threw the wall and into their craft,the interior was pearlized white/cream like in color, when i touched the wall, there was like a slight glow around my hand and fingers, the seats were molded into the wall, there was some translucence to the walls of the craft, where ever we went to, you can see the night turn into day, it went from dark to light really fast durring that travel, in the middle of the craft i saw this weird bulb light thing, i walked to it "it was humming and yo could feel vibrating air like around it" i went to put my right hand on it and the short fat brown being grabbed my wrist, his hand/thing felt like sand paper! the little gray in between the two put his hand up to where the brown one saw his hand and let go of my hand, then the huge bluish gray thing pointed to the wall, so i looked at the wall and the craft was either stopped or it slowed down to a still, it was lit out side, then the tallest one looked down, so i looked down and the craft slowly dipped the bottom of the craft into water, we were in water! then it plunged downward and i looked up as they did and i saw a beautiful coral reef, you could see some fish swimming all around, some plants, i remember a huge yellow fish with a blue striped next to the wall of the craft, then i looked at the things you have the brown on on my left the gray in the middle and the bluish-gray on my right, the little gray said "we do exist" ((mentally)) his mouth did not move! then they looked out into the water, the craft pulled up slowly out of the water, the walls became slightly non-trandlucent again, the craft took off then it went from light to dark! before i knew it the tall being came to my side to lead me back to my place ((my hallway, we stood back in my hall way)) i looked up at this being and for some reason it made me feel like as though it was a female, she must of been between 6-7 feet huge wrap around pit shaped jel like eyes, she had fat hairs lining the bottom of her eyes, and on the tight areas of the facial skin there were bumps or pits, maybe like poors or blemishes! i dont know, no expressions! but it seems very calm, and dainty like, i believe the other two were male, they just acted differently from the tallest one, anyway looking at her, i wasnt scared but i looked into my room and the clock now said 12:15am exactly!, my husband and baby were sleeping in the opposite direction and my side of the bed was still empty! i crawled back into bed, looked at her as she went threw the wall and gone from my life! from that day one, i have had a new prospective about life else where and where they may be hiding out! and i also hear destorted windpipe chime noises "very rarely" but i dont know what it is!  i can draw this as well if you would like. just let me know.
content.summary: Small ovel pit like

content.detailedDescription:
In 1976 i was 8 years old and my best friend was 9 years old, we were with my dad driving down on an old country road, heading to a mcdonalds in the country side, when all of a sudden my dad is excited and saying and pointing..."look over there!, at the big house on the hill!, wait ill pull over!" so he then pulled over, we all got out of the car and he directed my friend and i to look at the farm house!, there was this two story "5 br?" house "with three windows on the top story", there was a clolorful glowing sphere on the left side of the house about 30 feet from the top story left bedroom window. with a blusih-white beam, beaming across all three windows, "back and fourth", there was a slight hum
noise, then the beam of light went out, then the sphere swayed in reverse a bit then took off out of sight, "dissapeared!" the sphere was possably the size of two-three huge 1976 cars put together!, there wasnt one place on the sphere that wasnt glowing! the colorful lights lit up the air around the craft! it was actually really beautiful! people dont believe me, by my friend, dad and i were not on drugs! we were only 8 and 9 years old we saw what my dad saw! from that day and on, ive have believed that other life existes else where! we cant be alone! it would be stupid to think were the only life that exists! ive also came to the conclusion that if we have so many ethnics and species of life on our planet...There has to be the same else where! i wish i had pics! i can draw this event for anyone who is interested in seeing what we saw that night!! just email me :)

christine
content.summary: Colorful glowing sphere

content.detailedDescription:

it's posted here.

content.detailedDescription:

i seemed to have 'caught' something.  i don't know what it is, but it sure appears as though it could be something other than a conventional aircraft.

here is a picture.

there may be other 'anamolous objects as well.
content.summary: Taking random pictures and caught something on digital

content.detailedDescription:
The following narrative was told to me(richard moss) by a writer for the st. paul pioneer-press concerning a flashing light seen by a hudson, wisconsin resident.  the narrative that follows is from a law officer's report obtained by the writer and was verbally communicated to me via telephone.

members of mufon (state not specified) contacted washington county about 10:15 pm on sept. 24, 2007 to find out if there had been any sightings of unidentified flying objects in the skies over washington county at around 10:15pm on monday sept. 24, 2007.  an orb-like object was reportedly seen by a home owner in hudson, wisconsin five nights in a row.  the witness (female) said that the light was flashing very fast, was bright, and hovered in the same spot at the minnesota - wisconsin border for what seemed like fifteen to twenty minutes - joined by a similar light.
content.summary: Rapidly flashing light near minnesota-wisconsin border joined by a second light.

content.detailedDescription:
When i was four-or-five months pregnant, i had the strangest "dream" ever, about *the grey* aliens coming to visit me! my baby's father (now my ex-boyfriend) fell asleep in the living room of my apartment; and my bedroom (where i fell asleep) was right behind the wall, adjacent to where he was.
the next morning, i got up and told "brent" (not his real name, just using an alias) about the dream i had and that *the greys* were trying to "abduct my unborn fetus".  he turned to me and said, "oreally? i had the same dream..." (as if it was nothing to it).
i said, "what?!? what do you mean by that!?!": brent said, "yes, i was there, i know what happened": i said, "nooo way!!!": he said, "yuup, it's true": then, brent and i got in this long-conversation (about *the greys*).  brent told me once, that he was nearly abducted by them (when he was around four years old), on his grandfather's farm in oklahoma. he reminded me of that incident and said all this stuff about them.  mainly, the one thing he told me, stuck in my mind like glue. he told me that *the greys* tend to "go after" people that are related, that they are probably trying to collect some "d/n/a samples" and running experiments of some kind.  (i was totally flabber-gasted, hearing all of this).  i didn't know much beforehand, about *the greys*, let alone have a dream about them!  i was still left wandering...
then it donned on me, i remembered years before, i used to watch this show on television, called "strange universe" (it was either on the scifi-channel, or t/l/c, or the discovery-channel: i don't remember which), but i do recall seeing this same egg-shaped craft on that show!  so after 04/24/1997, i became a true believer of ufo-phenomena, since that's the date i witnessed my first-sighting! (reminder: i was about 8-months pregnant by then).  i don't guarantee that these two-events are in any way related, but there's a strong possibility that they are (is all i can say)! --i believe in u/f/o's now, without a shadow-of-doubt in my mind, and i also am aware....."there's a huge government cover-up about all of this (no doubt)!!!"  please feel-free to contact me, for any additional information you might want to know! sincerely, *brenda.Alias*
content.summary: I looked-up, from the doorway, and noticed 3-egg shaped (metal) craft,

content.detailedDescription: I was standing front of my shop, saw this floating,coming toward sw then it stop and stayed there for a wile a long while. a friend next door came over ask what i was photographing and i showed him by pointing at it . he said it could be a weather balloon. do you think it was?
content.summary: White oval

content.detailedDescription:
I was camping with my family near woodstock.  night had fallen and the stars had come out.  the campground was quieting down for the night, and i was sitting at our dying campfire, watching the skies. there were a couple of satellites high up, and a few airplanes flying at cruising altitude.  there are no large airports nearby.  i noticed a dark red sphere, roughly half to a mile high, crossing the sky silently, from southwest to northeast.  it had no lights, no comtrail, and made no sound.  it was not catching the sunlight from the sun setting over the horizon, but also did not seem to have any running lights.  it was illuminated just enough to be seen against the darkening sky.  

it crossed the sky in about 90 seconds before going out of sight over the far horizon.  the campground is on the slope of a river valley so i i had a panoramic view of the sky and of the flightpath of the object.

i saw no other objects or pursuing aircraft.
content.summary: Silent red sphere flies across the sky

content.detailedDescription: my wife and i were at the doctors office in downtown bakersfield. we were sitting by the window and my wife seen what appeared to be a string of balloons in a cluster toward the west of us. the objects went from a cluster to a straight line and my wife asked if they were balloons and i said they look like it. the wind was blowing from the west so we watched them to see if they came towards us. the objects then broke out of a straight line and 2 white and one red went north and the others went south. i thought this was strange and it then came apparent that these were not ballons when they came back together after being very far apart. they lined up again with the white objects on top and the red on the bottom. at this time more than ten people were watching the objects hovering in one spot. the red objects then merged with the white ones and they started moving west then disappeared. all of us who were watching were stunned at what we saw.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 6 sphere shape objects, 3 red in color and 3 white.

content.detailedDescription:
Hi,

i had just awoken to get a glass of water when i saw this brilliant light outside just east of edmonton ab canada.
my ufo experience last sunday morning is on free video at:

http://www.Metacafe.Com/watch/851350/ufo_spectacular_over_edmonton/ 

please feel free to share on your website as well as in newsletters, magazines and radio.  it was spectacular!  (the incredible thing is that just a few hours before i had been reading stanton coblentz's book the last of the great race about a large purple orb discovered in the arizona desert and now, hours later, is largely a purple orb i have on film!  a coincidence?

val
content.summary: Spectacular ufo over edmonton ab canada

content.detailedDescription: It was 9:40 p.M. central daylight time, october 2, 2007.  i was standing on my back deck waiting for my dog.  we have a very nice view of the night sky to the north when it's clear which it was tonight.  i regularly see meteors and satilites, it was these and the stars in general that i was looking at and/or for.  i happened to see a very faint meteor that looked like it was very far up in the atmosphere becuase they are usually much brighter.  this was to the north/northeast.  after that got my attention, i continued to scan the sky further to the north when i seen a triangle shape flying from north/northeast to south/southwest.  it had no lights what so-ever.  because of this it was virtually invisible against the night sky.  i have very good eyesight though and was able to make out just the front of the object which was triangle shaped, just more spread apart.  i could not make out the rest of it however, but it definitly had mass because it blocked out a few stars as it passed overhead.  it was so nearly invisible against the night sky and that it had no sound if you wasn't looking up at the right exact moment or have fair to bad eyesight, you would have never known it was there.  it was completly silent!  i could not say with any accuracy how big it was or how fast it was moving ( the whole thing took just long enough to fly over and disappear over the houses, just seconds ) or how far up it was.  i look at the night sky every night and have never seen anything like this!!  wow!!!  we also live near an approach pattern to epply airfield.  i've seen many planes at all altitudes at all hours of the day and night.  this was not a plane! i didn't know what it was when i first saw it, so i really focused on it and knew it was never anything i have seen before.  i think i may have even quit breathing for a few seconds.  virtually invisible with no lights, completly soundless and triangle shape.  that's about it.
content.summary: Fly over, no lights, almost invisible, no sound

content.detailedDescription:
Went out to check weather and have a cigar between 4:30 & 5:00 am est. looked up at the stars as always and spotted a gold, yellowish light traveling east up with the stars trucking faster than any aircraft. no strobe, no green, no red nav lights. 

what could it have been? a satellite? the space station? space junk? did not enter earths atmosphere. thought i would report this. it was something just passing us by fast up with the stars in space. i'll bet they know all about us and some of us know about them. just a route that took them by us like two ships passing in the night! it was wild. wished i could have seen it with a telescope. i will be ready next time for sure!

i wished they would stop or maybe e are just not ready yet. i hope that i will be able to see "them" in my life time. i am sure it is just a matter of time before they come. i hope they come in peace. i believe that someone probably (our government) knows about them and probably has contact. they may even be among us now! who knows. but i know one thing they are out there! i feel insulted that my government hides this from us and thinks i wouldn't be able to handle it. this is 2007 not the 40's for god's sake!

thanks
content.summary: A fast gold, yellowish light going across the sky in space up wih the stars!

content.detailedDescription:
I live in the coastal city of swansea, in south-west wales, uk. at the far western edge of the city, on the coast, is an area known as the mumbles. i visited this area on june 30th 2006, catching a bus which dropped me off on the road above a small cove called limeslade, at approximately 16.45. i went there to take some photographs for my weblog. 

it was a beautiful, hot summer's day, and my plan had been to take some photos, grab an ice-cream from the nearby cafe, walk out to the coastal path, and then return, before following the coastal walk back to the nearest village, oystermouth, to get a bus home. strange as this sounds, i suddenly got the sense that i shouldn't venture out onto the isolated coastal path alone. that could have been just the natural caution of a woman out walking alone, admittedly. but as i stood overlooking limeslade, taking my shots, i grew more and more uneasy, to the point where i felt quite desperate to leave the area. i blamed my discomfort on the heat of the day, and when the next bus arrived, around 17.15, i hopped aboard and returned to the city centre.

i thought no more of it, until i uploaded my pics onto my pc that evening. one of the shots showed a bizarre, airborne object, which seemed to be flying over the sea. i considered this may have just been an insect or airborne seed, close to the camera. however, it looks like a larger object some distance from the camera. the object looks like some kind of prehistoric creature - a pterydactyl or other such creature. i've attached my original shot, plus an enlarged, cropped section of the shot, showing the object. i don't know the precise time the pic was taken, but it was sometime between 16.45 and 17.10 on that day.

i'm hoping you can give me a rational explanation for this strange apparition - there probably is one, despite how i felt at the time the shot was taken. many thanks for your time.
content.summary: Strange flying object found in image, not seen at the time.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and 2 others witnessed a ufo sighting on september 15th around the time of 8:30-9pm est in delaware, oh. i've been stargazing my entire life on and off, so when i looked up at cassiopeia, down and to the left (approx 230 deg) i easily noticed two much brighter "stars", about the brightness of polaris/venus when quite brilliant. 

i had just walked up to a bonfire, and was looking up at what was turning into a wonderful night sky with hardly any light pollution. as i noticed them near cassiopeia, i took a few seconds to determine if these were jets or satellites, and after they remained motionless, i knew they were something else, especially with their size, placement and brightness. i drew my wife and friend's attention a couple other bystanders to them and they were all able to see the objects. they stayed immobile for about 15-20 seconds, then slowly started moving. they moved in parallel what looked like out of orbit (in the direction of the t below). it took approximately 30-45 seconds, perhaps longer, for the ufo lights to go completely invisible to our naked eye. unfortunately it wasn't completely dark at the time or we could have tracked them further, i believe.

someone mentioned maybe they were satellites. i immediately discounted this because they were not moving on any axis (pointed out a satellite on the orbital plane later that evening to my wife and others), and initially they were not moving at all.


     *     *    *
        *   
              *

    (*)t (*)
        \
         \
content.summary: Two bright star-like objects below cassiopeia sit motionless for a brief time then move slowly equidistant away to finally fade out of vision

content.detailedDescription:
On september 6th, 2007, at 7:07pm i took three consecutive images of the sunset with my "blackberry 8300 curve" from my apartment facing the hudson river.  one image appears to have an unidentified object which was not witnessed by me at the time. images attached. they are still saved in my blackberry along with their "properties." 

sincerely,

andre strishak

content.detailedDescription: Cloaked ufo's shadow appears in clouds back lit by the sun. i also saw a huge semi transparent sphere it looked to be about 40,000 feet and the same diameter as the sun. see the rest at webcamufo.Com
content.summary: Cloaked ufo's shadow appears in clouds see the rest at webcamufo.Com
